cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuushou

sentence.kanji: 私たちのチームが優勝しました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi no chi-mu ga yuushou shimashita
sentence.english: Our team won the championship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's handoutai

sentence.kanji: 半導体は様々な製品に使われているよ。
sentence.romaji: handoutai ha samazama na seihin ni tsukawarete iru yo
sentence.english: Semiconductors are used in many products.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fujuubun

sentence.kanji: その程度の努力では不十分です。
sentence.romaji: sono teido no doryoku de ha fujuubun desu
sentence.english: That amount of effort is insufficient.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuzai

sentence.kanji: 妻の不在中、夫は毎日外食したんだ。
sentence.romaji: tsuma no fuzaichuu oto ha mainichi gaishoku shita n da
sentence.english: The husband dined out every day during his wife's absence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichidoni

sentence.kanji: 皆の顔と名前を一度には覚えられません。
sentence.romaji: minna no kao to namae wo ichidoni ha oboeraremasen
sentence.english: I can't remember everyone's name and face at once.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitei

sentence.kanji: 彼、友達の意見を否定した。
sentence.romaji: kare tomodachi no iken wo hitei shita
sentence.english: He disagreed with his friend's opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saiban

sentence.kanji: 裁判の様子はテレビで中継されたわよ。
sentence.romaji: saiban no yousu ha terebi de chuukei sareta wa yo
sentence.english: Scenes of the trial were broadcast on television.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saibansho

sentence.kanji: 彼らは裁判所の前で知らせを待っています。
sentence.romaji: karera ha saibansho no mae de shirase wo mate imasu
sentence.english: They are waiting for information in front of the courthouse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futokui

sentence.kanji: 私は数学が不得意です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha suugaku ga futokui desu
sentence.english: I'm not good at math.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiyake

sentence.kanji: 海で日焼けしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: umi de hiyake shita n da
sentence.english: I got sunburnt at the seaside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakiniku

sentence.kanji: 彼は焼き肉が大好きです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yakiniku ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: He loves beef barbecue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuyake

sentence.kanji: 今日は夕焼けがきれいです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha yuuyake ga kirei desu
sentence.english: The sunset glow is beautiful today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakisoba

sentence.kanji: お祭りで焼きそばを食べたよ。
sentence.romaji: omatsuri de yakisoba wo tabeta yo
sentence.english: I ate pan-fried noodles at the festival.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunsan

sentence.kanji: その会社はいろいろな国に投資を分散しているね。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha iroiro na kuni ni toushi wo bunsan shite iru ne
sentence.english: The company spreads their investment into a variety of countries.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiru

sentence.kanji: 風で桜の花が散ってるね。
sentence.romaji: kaze de sakura no hana ga chiteru ne
sentence.english: Cherry blossoms are scattering in the wind.

cards.english: lie scattered about, be in disorder
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chirakaru

sentence.kanji: 弟の部屋はいつも散らかっているんだ。
sentence.romaji: otouto no heya ha itsumo chirakate iru n da
sentence.english: My little brother's room is always untidy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chirakasu

sentence.kanji: 部屋を散らかさないでください。
sentence.romaji: heya wo chirakasanai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't mess up the room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haraipai

sentence.kanji: 夕食を腹一杯食べた。
sentence.romaji: yuushoku wo haraipai tabeta
sentence.english: I ate heartily at supper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekido

sentence.kanji: 健康のため、適度な運動が必要です。
sentence.romaji: kenkou no tame tekido na undou ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: Moderate exercise is necessary for your health.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyohi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は出席を拒否した。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shuseki wo kyohi shita
sentence.english: She refused to attend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chirabaru

sentence.kanji: 机の上に書類が散らばっている。
sentence.romaji: tsukue no ue ni shorui ga chirabate iru
sentence.english: The documents were scattered on the desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hankei

sentence.kanji: この円の半径は5センチです。
sentence.romaji: kono en no hankei ha 5 senchi desu
sentence.english: The radius of this circle is five centimeters.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fujiyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は不自由な暮らしに慣れたようだね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fujiyuu na kurashi ni nareta you da ne
sentence.english: It seems that he's gotten used to his restricted lifestyle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sochi

sentence.kanji: 被災者を救うための特別な措置が取られました。
sentence.romaji: hisaisha wo sukuu tame no tokubetsu na sochi ga toraremashita
sentence.english: Special measures were taken to help the disaster vicitims.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshimu

sentence.kanji: 私たちはみな彼の死を惜しんだの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha mina kare no shi wo oshinda no
sentence.english: We all felt sorry about his death.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshii

sentence.kanji: 惜しい、もう少しで優勝だった。
sentence.romaji: oshii mousukoshi de yuushou data
sentence.english: How close! We almost won.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's funka

sentence.kanji: 島で火山が噴火したよ。
sentence.romaji: shima de kazan ga funka shita yo
sentence.english: The volcano erupted on the island.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's funsui

sentence.kanji: 公園の噴水の前で会いましょう。
sentence.romaji: kouen no funsui no mae de aimashou
sentence.english: Let's meet in front of the fountain in the park.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miwatasu

sentence.kanji: 丘の上から草原を見渡したの。
sentence.romaji: oka no ue kara sougen wo miwatashita no
sentence.english: I looked over the meadow from the top of the hill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaeru

sentence.kanji: 家に帰ろう。
sentence.romaji: uchi ni kaerou
sentence.english: Let's go home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyoi

sentence.kanji: 今日は風が強い。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kaze ga tsuyoi
sentence.english: There's a strong wind today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yowai

sentence.kanji: その子は体が少し弱い。
sentence.romaji: sono ko ha karada ga sukoshi yowai
sentence.english: That child has a somewhat weak constitution.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiku

sentence.kanji: このドアは引いてください。
sentence.romaji: kono doa ha hiite kudasai
sentence.english: Please pull this door open.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitanai

sentence.kanji: 彼の部屋はとても汚い。
sentence.romaji: kare no heya ha totemo kitanai
sentence.english: His room is very dirty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otouto

sentence.kanji: 弟は野球が好きです。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha yakyuu ga suki desu
sentence.english: My little brother likes baseball.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiru

sentence.kanji: 誰もその話を知らない。
sentence.romaji: dare mo sono hanashi wo shiranai
sentence.english: No one knows that story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaeri

sentence.kanji: 仕事の帰りにビールを飲んだ。
sentence.romaji: shigoto no kaeri ni bi-ru wo nonda
sentence.english: I had a beer on the way home from work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torihiki

sentence.kanji: 私たちは中国の会社と取引しています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha chuugoku no kaisha to torihiki shite imasu
sentence.english: We're dealing with a Chinese company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouka

sentence.kanji: 国は国語教育を強化しています。
sentence.romaji: kuni ha kokugo kyouiku wo kyouka shite imasu
sentence.english: Our government is strengthening its program in native language education.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsuru

sentence.kanji: このカメラはよく写りますよ。
sentence.romaji: kono kamera ha yoku utsurimasu yo
sentence.english: This camera takes good pictures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shashin

sentence.kanji: 写真は良い思い出になります。
sentence.romaji: shashin ha ii omoide ni narimasu
sentence.english: Photographs make a good souvenir.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kazoku

sentence.kanji: うちは五人家族です。
sentence.romaji: uchi ha gonin kazoku desu
sentence.english: We're a family of five.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikizan

sentence.kanji: 娘は学校で引き算を習っている。
sentence.romaji: musume ha gakou de hikizan wo narate iru
sentence.english: My daughter's learning subtraction at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は帰国しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kikoku shimashita
sentence.english: He returned to his country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoudai

sentence.kanji: 彼は3人兄弟です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sannin kyoudai desu
sentence.english: He has two siblings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shingou

sentence.kanji: 信号が青になった。
sentence.romaji: shingou ga ao ni nata
sentence.english: The traffic light turned green.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsusu

sentence.kanji: 彼は友達の答えを写した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tomodachi no kotae wo utsushita
sentence.english: He copied down his friend's answers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouchou

sentence.kanji: 彼は良いところだけを強調した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yoi tokoro dake wo kyouchou shita
sentence.english: He only emphasized the strong points.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jimusho

sentence.kanji: 後で事務所に来てください。
sentence.romaji: atode jimusho ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please come to the office later.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jimushitsu

sentence.kanji: 事務室でコピーを取って来ます。
sentence.romaji: jimushitsu de kopi- wo tote kimasu
sentence.english: I'm going to make copies in the office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yogosu

sentence.kanji: 彼は服を汚した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fuku wo yogoshita
sentence.english: He got his clothes dirty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yogoreru

sentence.kanji: エプロンをしないと服が汚れます。
sentence.romaji: epuron wo shinai to fuku ga yogoremasu
sentence.english: Your clothes will get dirty if you don't wear an apron.
